result.title: Number Theory
result.content:
In this first blog, I write down the some topics we have discussed about Number Theory. You are welcome to complete it in your comments!

  1. Harmonic series:
  2. Goldbach's conjecture: Every even integer greater than 2 can be expressed as the sum of two primes. http://codeforces.com/problemset/problem/472/A
    http://codeforces.com/problemset/problem/17/A
    http://codeforces.com/contest/584/problem/D
  3. Fibonacci number sequence. was introduced by Only_love97 and namnh, I will write a blog about this topic later
  4. Euler's Totient Function: was introduced by Trans and ngonngon, I will write a blog about this topic later

Additionally, we talked about next_permutaion() function in C++. It's very useful for the following problems: http://codeforces.com/group/JaQvFKqeEJ/contest/206585/problem/K http://codeforces.com/group/JaQvFKqeEJ/contest/206602/problem/C

To be continued...
